book.title: The Lord of the Rings
book.description: the Lord of the Rings is an epic high fantasy novel written by English philologist and University of Oxford professor J. R. R. Tolkien

book.title: Apollo 13
book.description: Apollo 13 was the seventh manned mission in the American Apollo space program and the third intended to land on the Moon

book.title: 2001: A Space Oddysey
book.description: 2001: A Space Odyssey is a 1968 British-American science fiction film produced and directed by Stanley Kubrick

book.title: Dune
book.description: Dune is a 1984 science fiction film written and directed by David Lynch, based on the 1965 Frank Herbert novel of the same name.
